articles.author: Moneycontrol
articles.title: 10 Animals That Have Been to Space - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Exploring space has not been limited to humans; various animals have also made the journey beyond Earth. Check here the list of 10 animals that have been to space.
articles.content: Since 1948, 32 monkeys and apes, including rhesus macaques and chimpanzees, have been sent to space. Ham, a chimpanzee, was the first great ape in space, launched by NASA in 1961 and returned safely.
